baggage_modal.priority_boarding: Priority Boarding is included for free in this bundle (__airlines__).
baggage_modal.alert.collect_and_recheck: You must collect and recheck your baggage between certain flights.
baggage_modal.subheader.switch_option: Switch your current bundle for a new one:
baggage_modal.tooltip.cabin_baggage: Includes smaller bags that can be taken into the cabin and stored in the overhead locker or under your seat.
baggage_modal.tooltip.checked_baggage: Includes larger baggage items that you must deposit at the airline check-in counter before going through security at the airport.
baggage_modal.blue_ribbon_bags.collect_m: Collect 1,000 € for every bag that doesn't arrive within 96 hours. Applies to all bags in your booking.
booking.savings_banner.title: Thanks to this unique itinerary, you'll save __amount__ __currency__
booking.savings_banner.description: Booking a return ticket is cheaper than a one-way flight. You can use the return flight if you want, but you don't have to. Some airlines dislike this practice, but we're offering it to you because you have the right to freedom of choice.
content.cookies.banner.text: When you browse our website, we collect and process your personal data. You can learn more about why and how we process your personal data in our Privacy Policy. To collect your personal data, we use cookies. If you don't want us to send you cookies, you can turn them off at any time by changing your cookies preferences here.
content.cookies.banner.your_privacy.text: While browsing our website, we collect and process your personal data. One of the ways we do this is by using cookies to collect and process your personal data. By clicking Accept, you agree to the use of cookies for performance, first- and third-party marketing purposes. You can learn more about why and how we process your personal data in our Privacy Policy.
content.cookies_settings.general.content: If you don't want to receive certain types of cookies on Kiwi.com, you can change your cookie settings on this page. You can learn more about how and why we use cookies in our Privacy Policy.
content.cookies_settings.necessary.title: Necessary cookies
content.cookies_settings.necessary.descr: These cookies are necessary for multiple basic functionalities of our website and for the provision of our services as we want to provide them. Without them, our website wouldn't work, therefore, you can't turn them off.
content.cookies_settings.performance.des: These cookies are used for internal purposes. They help us understand our customers and improve our website so that we can ultimately deliver you a better user experience. Without these cookies, we aren't able to measure traffic or visualize user interactions with various elements on the website. This makes it harder for us to test new functionalities we believe might be better suited to your needs.
content.cookies_settings.marketing.title: Marketing cookies
content.cookies_settings.marketing.descr: We only provide offers we believe to be relevant for users. As a result, we collect some personal information and send it to our partners, who in turn tailor the best offers, promo codes, and relevant flights for you.
content.cookies_settings.third_party_mar: Some cookies on our site collect data which is shared with our partners. These partners will then use this data to show you customized ads by third-party companies across the internet. We will never share any data which would allow your direct identification with the partners.
baggage_modal.contact_support: To add baggage to your trip, please <ref>contact us</ref>.

baggage_modal.tooltip.not_available: We are sorry, but something went wrong. To add a baggage to your trip, please contact our customer service.
